how do you configure gnome for other window managers? like fluxbox?

essentially if you have a compliant windomanager, open the session manager and a terminal; remove metacity from the list of items in the session, fire up another windowmanager from a terminal, make sure your wm of choice is set to auto-respawn, and you're golden.
